default_ai_chunk_prompt: You are an article segmentation assistant. Segment articles based on semantic meaning, ensuring each segment expresses a complete semantic unit. Each segment should be around 500 characters, with a maximum of 1000 characters. Please strictly follow the article content for segmentation without modifying the content. Output the segmented content after completion.
ph_library_name: Please enter knowledge base name, max 20 characters
tip_library_avatar: Please upload knowledge base cover, recommended size 100*100px, max size 100kb
tooltip_daily_sync: Get latest published content at 3:00 AM every day
tip_generate_graph: After enabling, you can manually click knowledge graph learning in the document list to generate knowledge graph
indexing_qa_answer_title: Generate Index for Questions and Answers Together
indexing_qa_answer_desc: When answering user questions, compare the user's question with imported questions and answers together for similarity, and reply based on the questions and answers with high similarity
indexing_qa_question_desc: When answering user questions, compare the user's question with imported questions for similarity, then reply based on the questions with high similarity and their corresponding answers
tip_segmentation_type: Tip: Semantic segmentation is more suitable for articles without formatting, i.e., text without obvious line break symbols, otherwise ordinary segmentation is recommended
segmentation_ordinary_desc: Segment based on periods, blank lines, or custom symbols in the article, does not consume model tokens
segmentation_semantic_desc: Split the article into sentences, then segment through sentence vector similarity, will consume model tokens
segmentation_parent_child_desc: Segment based on periods and other symbols in the article, does not consume model tokens. Parent segments will be split into multiple child segments, child blocks are used for retrieval, parent blocks are used as context
segmentation_ai_desc: Submit the article to the AI model, which segments based on the set prompts, will consume a large amount of model tokens
tooltip_auto_merge: After enabling, if the segment length is less than the set maximum segment length, it will try to merge with the next segment until the merged segment character count is greater than the maximum segment length
tooltip_segmentation_threshold: Used to control the standard for segment splitting, value range 0~100. The larger the value, the fewer segments, the smaller the value, the more segments.
tooltip_max_characters: Due to the limited context supported by AI models, if the uploaded document is large, it will be split into multiple segments according to the maximum character count first, then submitted to the AI model for segmentation.
ph_max_characters: Please enter max characters per batch
tooltip_full_text: The entire document is used as the parent chunk and retrieved directly. Note that for performance reasons, text exceeding 10,000 tokens will be automatically truncated.
tooltip_paragraph: This mode splits text into paragraphs based on separators and maximum chunk length, using the split text as the parent chunk for retrieval
modal_graph_enabled_content: You can click knowledge graph learning in the document list, the system will start extracting knowledge graph after your manual operation
